<ce:section-title id="st020">Synthesis of [Hg(MPC)Cl<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>] (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0030" view="all">0.19<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g (1.00<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) of MPC dissolved in EtOH (10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL), was added with stirring to a solution of 0.27<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g (1.00<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) of HgCl<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf> in EtOH (20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL). The reaction mixture was stirred at 60<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h. Colorless crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained from the solution after standing for 5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>days. Yield: 0.41<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 88%; m. p. 158<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C. <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">9</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">9</ce:inf>Cl<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>HgNO<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf> (466.67): C, 23.16; H, 1.94; N, 3.00. Found: C, 24.32; H, 2.05; N, 3.85%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3078m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH<ce:inf loc="post">ar</ce:inf>), 2947m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH), 1724 s (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>O), 1578m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>N), 1435m (<ce:italic>δ</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">as</ce:inf> CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>), 1312 s (<ce:italic>δ</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">s</ce:inf> CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>), 1257 v (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="sbnd"></ce:glyph>O), 748m and 694m (<ce:italic>γ</ce:italic> py). Raman (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3071 w (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH<ce:inf loc="post">ar</ce:inf>), 2980 w (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH), 1634<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>N), 678m (<ce:italic>γ</ce:italic> py), 506 w (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> HgN), 385m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> HgO), 239m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> HgCl). <ce:sup loc="pre">1</ce:sup>H NMR (300<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>MHz, DMSO<ce:italic>-d</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>, ppm): <ce:italic>δ</ce:italic>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>=<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>8.17–8.29 (m, 3 H, CH<ce:inf loc="post">ar</ce:inf>), 3.91–3.92 (d, 6 H, CH).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st025">Synthesis of [Cd(MPC)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>][CdBr<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>] (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0035" view="all">0.59<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g (3.00<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) of MPC dissolved in MeOH (20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL), was added with stirring to a solution of 0.68<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g (2.00<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) of CdBr<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O in MeOH (20<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL). The reaction mixture was stirred at 60<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h. Colorless crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained from the solution after standing for 3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>days. Yield: 0.44<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 78%; m. p. 183<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C. <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">27</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">27</ce:inf>Br<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>Cd<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf> (1129.95): C, 28.70; H, 2.41; N, 3.72. Found: C, 30.03; H, 2.23; N, 4.27%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3086m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH<ce:inf loc="post">ar</ce:inf>), 2976m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH), 1716 s (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>O), 1596 s (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>N), 1450m (<ce:italic>δ</ce:italic>

Raman (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3040 w (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH<ce:inf loc="post">ar</ce:inf>), 2946 w (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH), 1635m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>N), 1374 w (<ce:italic>δ</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">s</ce:inf> CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>), 1296m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="sbnd"></ce:glyph>O), 785 w and 684 w (<ce:italic>γ</ce:italic> py), 461 w (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CdN), 338m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CdO), 131m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CdBr). <ce:sup loc="pre">1</ce:sup>H NMR (300<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>MHz, DMSO<ce:italic>-d</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>, ppm): <ce:italic>δ</ce:italic>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>=<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>8.20–8.47 (m, 3 H, CH<ce:inf loc="post">ar</ce:inf>), 3.92–3.96 (d, 6 H, CH).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="st030">Synthesis of {K[Cr(PDC)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]}<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>3</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0040" view="all">0.39<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g (2.00<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) of MPC dissolved in EtOH (10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL), was added with stirring to a solution of 0.30<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g (1.00<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol) of K<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>[Cr(O<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>] in H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL). The reaction mixture was stirred at 60<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h. Light brown crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained from the solution after standing for a week. Yield: 0.22<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 53%; m. p.<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>><ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>300<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C. <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">14</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>CrKN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf> (421.31): C, 39.91; H, 1.44; N, 6.65. Found: C, 39.52; H, 1.68; N, 6.82%. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3086m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH<ce:inf loc="post">ar</ce:inf>), 1715m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>O), 1618m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>N), 1452m (<ce:italic>δ</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">as</ce:inf> CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>), 1379m (<ce:italic>δ</ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">s</ce:inf> CH<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>), 1281 v (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="sbnd"></ce:glyph>O), 741m and 694m (<ce:italic>γ</ce:italic> py). Raman (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3024 w (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CH<ce:inf loc="post">ar</ce:inf>), 1696 s (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>O), 1541m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="dbnd"></ce:glyph>N), 1323m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> C<ce:glyph name="sbnd"></ce:glyph>O), 739m (<ce:italic>γ</ce:italic> py), 617m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CrN), 461m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> CrO), 304m (<ce:italic>ν</ce:italic> KO).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of [Hg(MPC)Cl2] (1)

0.19g (1.00mmol) of MPC dissolved in EtOH (10mL), was added with stirring to a solution of 0.27g (1.00mmol) of HgCl2 in EtOH (20mL). The reaction mixture was stirred at 60°C for 5h. Colorless crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained from the solution after standing for 5days. Yield: 0.41g, 88%; m. p. 158°C. Anal. Calc. for C9H9Cl2HgNO4 (466.67): C, 23.16; H, 1.94; N, 3.00. Found: C, 24.32; H, 2.05; N, 3.85%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3078m (ν CHar), 2947m (ν CH), 1724 s (ν CO), 1578m (ν CN), 1435m (δ as CH3), 1312 s (δ s CH3), 1257 v (ν CO), 748m and 694m (γ py). Raman (cm-1): 3071 w (ν CHar), 2980 w (ν CH), 1634m (ν CN), 678m (γ py), 506 w (ν HgN), 385m (ν HgO), 239m (ν HgCl). 1H NMR (300MHz, DMSO-d 6, ppm): δ =8.17-8.29 (m, 3 H, CHar), 3.91-3.92 (d, 6 H, CH).

Synthesis of [Cd(MPC)3][CdBr4] (2)

0.59g (3.00mmol) of MPC dissolved in MeOH (20mL), was added with stirring to a solution of 0.68g (2.00mmol) of CdBr2⋅4H2O in MeOH (20mL). The reaction mixture was stirred at 60°C for 5h. Colorless crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained from the solution after standing for 3days. Yield: 0.44g, 78%; m. p. 183°C. Anal. Calc. for C27H27Br4Cd2N3O12 (1129.95): C, 28.70; H, 2.41; N, 3.72. Found: C, 30.03; H, 2.23; N, 4.27%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3086m (ν CHar), 2976m (ν CH), 1716 s (ν CO), 1596 s (ν CN), 1450m (δ as CH3), 1373m (δ s CH3), 1288m (ν CO), 764 w and 687 w (γ py). Raman (cm-1): 3040 w (ν CHar), 2946 w (ν CH), 1635m (ν CN), 1374 w (δ s CH3), 1296m (ν CO), 785 w and 684 w (γ py), 461 w (ν CdN), 338m (ν CdO), 131m (ν CdBr). 1H NMR (300MHz, DMSO-d 6, ppm): δ =8.20-8.47 (m, 3 H, CHar), 3.92-3.96 (d, 6 H, CH).

Synthesis of {K[Cr(PDC)2]} n  (3)

0.39g (2.00mmol) of MPC dissolved in EtOH (10mL), was added with stirring to a solution of 0.30g (1.00mmol) of K3[Cr(O2)4] in H2O (10mL). The reaction mixture was stirred at 60°C for 5h. Light brown crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were obtained from the solution after standing for a week. Yield: 0.22g, 53%; m. p.>300°C. Anal. Calc. for C14H6CrKN2O8 (421.31): C, 39.91; H, 1.44; N, 6.65. Found: C, 39.52; H, 1.68; N, 6.82%. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3086m (ν CHar), 1715m (ν CO), 1618m (ν CN), 1452m (δ as CH3), 1379m (δ s CH3), 1281 v (ν CO), 741m and 694m (γ py). Raman (cm-1): 3024 w (ν CHar), 1696 s (ν CO), 1541m (ν CN), 1323m (ν CO), 739m (γ py), 617m (ν CrN), 461m (ν CrO), 304m (ν KO).
